Variant Calling and core SNP diagnostics PipelineÂ¶

  • Command line options
    • Required arguments
    • Optional arguments
    • Compute cluster options
  • Quickstart
    • Input
    • Run pipeline on Compute cluster
    • Run pipeline
  • Bonus Ducks
    • Run only a part of variant calling step
    • Run variant calling step on selected samples provided in filenames.txt.
    • Run core_prep and core steps on selected files

VCR is a pipeline that calls variants from PE/SE reads provided in a directory and generates core SNP/consensus fasta files that can be used as an input for downstream post-analysis.
